To preview the HTML file stored in the JCR, simply click the *Show Preview* button on the toolbar, or go to *Run > Show Preview* on the top menu after opening the HTML file in the _Content Panel_. The content of the HTML file is opened as a webpage in the IFRAME of _Preview Tab_.

{note}
* You cannot view files created but not saved yet.
* Unsaved changes are not displayed when you edit the HTML file.
{note}
